recommendations.name: Rafael Dias de Paula Costa
recommendations.relation: Foi meu tech lead e parceiro de desenvolvimento
recommendations.testimonial: I currently work with Davi and also worked with him before. He works well in team and like to helps colleagues in the daily basis. He is also very dedicated, punctual and dominates what he does.

recommendations.name: Luiz André Carvalho
recommendations.testimonial: Davi is an excellent member of any team, highly participative and always willing to help and pass on knowledge.

recommendations.name: Guilherme Borges Bastos
recommendations.testimonial: I did work with Davi at Deevo Studio, where we had to como up with solutions for different problems in a large set of technologies. Pair-programming and collaboration with him has always been smooth and very productive.

recommendations.name: Robson Matos
recommendations.testimonial: Davi é um excelente profissional, com um conhecimento vasto em tecnologias ligadas ao front end de aplicações. Sempre apto e proativo a resolver os problemas da melhor forma possível.

recommendations.name: Fábio Russo
recommendations.testimonial: Foi contratado como front end, porém ele teve a visão de que um profissional full stack seria essencial para comprir as demandas, então ele aprendeu backend e atuou como full stack. Isso demonstra o tamanho de seu empenho.

recommendations.name: Vando Faustino
recommendations.testimonial: Excelente profissional de altíssimo nível de profissionalismo, conhecedor das ferramentas que trabalha, antenado com novas tecnologias, espírito de equipe, dedicado, pontual, e sempre com respeito a clientes e funcionários seja qual for o cargo.

recommendations.name: Cesar Yamanishi
recommendations.testimonial: Davi é um profissional dedicado, eficiente e pró ativo. É autodidata, sempre buscando novos conhecimentos.

recommendations.name: Rafael Dias de Paula Costa
recommendations.relation: Was my tech lead and development partner
recommendations.testimonial: I currently work with Davi and also worked with him before. He works well in team and like to helps colleagues in the daily basis. He is also very dedicated, punctual and dominates what he does.

recommendations.name: Luiz André Carvalho
recommendations.testimonial: Davi is an excellent member of any team, highly participative and always willing to help and pass on knowledge.

recommendations.name: Guilherme Borges Bastos
recommendations.testimonial: I did work with Davi at Deevo Studio, where we had to como up with solutions for different problems in a large set of technologies. Pair-programming and collaboration with him has always been smooth and very productive.

recommendations.name: Robson Matos
recommendations.testimonial: Davi is an excellent professional, with a vast knowledge of technologies related to the front end of applications. Always able and proactive to solve problems in the best possible way.

recommendations.name: Fábio Russo
recommendations.testimonial: He was hired as a front end, but he had the vision that a full stack professional would be essential to meet the demands, so he learned backend and acted as a full stack. This demonstrates the size of his commitment.

recommendations.name: Vando Faustino
recommendations.testimonial: An excellent professional with a very high level of professionalism, knowledgeable about the tools he works with, attuned to new technologies, team spirit, dedicated, punctual, and always with respect to customers and employees, whatever the position.

recommendations.name: Cesar Yamanishi
recommendations.testimonial: Davi is a dedicated, efficient and proactive professional. He is self-taught, always seeking new knowledge.
